snippet: Dr. Andres, noted in the study of diabetes, gained his widest attention for challenging the conventional standards of late-life weight maintenance.
abstract: Dr Reubin Andres, gerontologist who gained attention for advocating weight gain in older people, dies at age 89.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Andres, noted in the study of diabetes, gained his widest attention for challenging the conventional standards of late-life weight maintenance.

headline.seo: Reubin Andres, an Advocate of Weight Gain, Dies at 89
headline.main: Reubin Andres, an Advocate of Weight Gain, Dies at 89
headline.print_headline: Reubin Andres, an Advocate Of Weight Gain, Dies at 89
